pages.text: When a combatant exhausts all their fractures, the final stun or knockdown will instead cause the mob to be $(#FF0000)$(l)Exposed$().$(br2)Similar to the knockdown, the expose completely disables the target once more, causing them to emit anger particles. Exposure typically lasts around 2-3 times longer than a knockdown.$(br2)

The thing that makes exposing the enemy so much more powerful, however, is that in this state $(l)all armor value is negated$() and the next hit will additionally take off $(l)10% of their max HP$(), allowing you to easily cleave through damage sponges by repeatedly fracturing them.

Some skills such as $(#FF8000)Decapitate$(), $(#808080)Danse Macabre$() and $(#3333FF)Frenzy$() can be used to further augment the damage you can deal on an exposed foe, provided you have the resources to cast it.$(br2)Regardless, when an combatant becomes exposed all their fractures are reset.$(br2)Exposure is represented by the center status diamond displaying a red eye.
